title: Did Feminists Burn Their Bras in Protest at the 1968 Miss America Pageant?
subtitle: The 1968 Miss America pageant supposedly spawned a decade of bra-burning by feminists as a means of calling attention to their cause.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: The 1968 Miss America pageant spawned a decade of bra-burning by feminists as a means of calling attention to their cause.
